scripts.build-product-dev: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/product_store .env && npm run google-service-product  && npx react-native run-android --variant=productDebug
scripts.build-product-store: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/product_store .env && npm run google-service-product  && cd ./android && ./gradlew bundleproductRelease
scripts.build-product-web: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/product_web .env && npm run google-service-product && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleproductRelease
scripts.build-product-huawei: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/product_huawei .env && npm run google-service-product && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleproductRelease
scripts.build-developer-dev: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/developer .env && npm run google-service-developer && npx react-native run-android --variant=developerDebug
scripts.build-developer-store: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/developer .env && npm run google-service-developer && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembledeveloperRelease
scripts.build-developer-web: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/developer_web .env && npm run google-service-developer && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembledeveloperRelease
scripts.build-developer-huawei: npm run clear-cache && cp -r env/developer_huawei .env && npm run google-service-developer && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembledeveloperRelease
